channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Creative Cloud Desktop Application (installer)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Creative Cloud Desktop Application (installer)

item.title: CVE-2019-7093|2024-08-04T20:38:33.319Z -- adobe -- creative%20cloud%20desktop%20application%20%28installer%29
item.description: Creative Cloud Desktop Application (installer) versions 4.7.0.400 and earlier have an insecure library loading (dll hijacking) vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to privilege escalation.
